name: Internal Algorithm Standard
description: Internal documentation standards for quantitative trading algorithm specifications

policies.name: Algorithm Overview
policies.description: Document must include a high-level overview of the trading algorithm

validation_rules.error_message: Document must include an overview section

policies.ai_prompt_template: Verify the document contains a clear high-level overview explaining: what the algorithm does, its purpose, and its general approach to trading.

policies.name: Signal Generation
policies.description: Must describe how trading signals are generated

validation_rules.error_message: Document must describe signal generation logic

policies.ai_prompt_template: Check that the document explains how trading signals are generated. Look for: entry conditions, exit conditions, signal thresholds, and the data/indicators used.

policies.name: Risk Management
policies.description: Must include risk management and position sizing rules

validation_rules.error_message: Document must include risk management section

policies.ai_prompt_template: Verify the document includes risk management rules such as: position sizing, stop-loss rules, maximum drawdown limits, and exposure limits.

policies.name: Execution Logic
policies.ai_prompt_template: Evaluate whether the document describes how orders are executed, including: order types, execution timing, slippage considerations, and market impact management.

policies.name: Backtesting Results
policies.ai_prompt_template: Check if the document includes backtesting results with key metrics such as: returns, Sharpe ratio, maximum drawdown, win rate, and profit factor.

policies.name: Data Requirements
policies.description: Should specify data inputs and requirements
policies.ai_prompt_template: Verify the document specifies data requirements including: data sources, update frequency, required fields, and data quality requirements.

policies.name: Dependencies and Infrastructure
policies.ai_prompt_template: Note whether the document includes infrastructure requirements such as: computing resources, latency requirements, third-party dependencies, and deployment considerations.

policies.name: Version History
policies.description: May include algorithm version history and changelog
policies.ai_prompt_template: Check if the document includes version history or changelog documenting algorithm modifications over time.
